getAmountAsLocalizedString() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPayment
Get the current Locale formatted String representation of the price.
getApplicationCorrelationId(Context) - Static method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalConfiguration
Deprecated.
Use getClientMetadataId Gets an Application Correlation ID at the time of future payment activity. Once a user has consented to future payments, when the user subsequently initiates a PayPal payment from their device to be completed by your server, PayPal uses a Correlation ID to verify that the payment is originating from a valid, user-consented device+application. This helps reduce fraud and decrease declines. This method MUST be called prior to initiating a pre-consented payment (a "future payment") from a mobile device. Pass the result to your server, to include in the payment request sent to PayPal. Do not otherwise cache or store this value.
getAuthorizationCode() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalAuthorization
Authorization code accessor.
getClientMetadataId(Context) - Static method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalConfiguration
Gets a Client Metadata ID at the time of future payment activity.

isNoShipping() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPayment
Determines if the no_shipping flag would be enabled.

When the retrieve_paypal_shipping_address is disabled, and no shipping address is provided by the app,
the paypal payment will not have any shipping information stored in that transaction.
isProcessable() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPayment
Determine if this payment can be processed.

A payment might not be processable if, for example:
- any field is null,
- the amount is non-positive,
- the amount includes more decimal fraction digits than the currency allows,
- there's no description,
- the payment intent is not defined, or
- optional BN code contains non-alphanumeric characters.
isProcessable() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalPaymentDetails
To be processable, the subtotal field must be populated.
isProcessable() - Method in class com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.ShippingAddress
